# Test: grove prune --commit removes worktree and deletes local branch
setup_workspace feature-to-delete

exec grove add feature-to-delete
exec git -C $WORK/testrepo branch -D feature-to-delete
exec grove prune --commit
stderr 'Pruned 1 worktree'
stderr 'feature-to-delete'
stderr 'deleted 1 local branch'
! exists ../feature-to-delete
assert_branch deleted feature-to-delete
